description: '''Nicholas Ihua-Maduenyi''' (born 28 October 1998), widely known as '''PsychoYP''', is a Nigerian [[alternative hip hop]] rapper, singer, and songwriter. He is a member of the music collective Apex Village. He came into the music scene with a critically acclaimed mixtape, ''YPSZN'', which earned him a nomination at the [[26th South African Music Awards|SAMAs]], and the [[The Headies 2020|Headies]] for his second fit  album ''YPSZN2''. Dubbed "The Fresh Prince of Nigerian Rap", he is regarded as one of Nigeria's [[Hip hop music|rap music]] pioneers in the [[alt√©]] music scene.
